interactivity.requirements: 10 Ayane Affection You must have seen or permanently missed the following Events: Seen " The Flavor of Love " from Rin Rokuhara Seen " Names of Our Children " from Ayane Amamiya Seen " Home Sweet Home " from Ayane Amamiya
interactivity.to_get_this_event: Call Ayane on a weekend morning after all Requirements have been fulfilled.

progression.synopsis: Hoping to hang out, Sensei gives Ayane a call, and after a bit of joking banter, Sensei tells her he wants to see her, and the sound of glass breaking can be heard on the other line amidst Ayane's surprise. The two resolve to head over to the Koi Cafe, before Ayane hangs up, rushing out to go to the cafe. Sensei arrives at the cafe to find Ayane studying, and is surprised to learn she has already ordered a meal for him based on secondhand knowledge. The two have a conversation about why Sensei chose the cafe to meet up and what Ayane thinks this gathering means, Molly appears, asking for their order. After she leaves, Ayane questions some of the content of Molly's speech, only for Sensei to tell her to effectively save herself the headache. Ayane begins talking to Sensei about her falling for him, and posits the theory that her attraction to him may be some form of late-stage imprinting, a point which Sensei acknowledges, not really bothering to question its validity. The two banter back and forth while Ayane becomes increasingly embroiled in her fantasies regarding Sensei, until eventually, the two decide to call it a day, and Sensei leaves to go about his evening.
trivia: Molly has a more detailed and involved cameo in this Event.

changelog: This Event was added in Update 0.24.
